mapper.insert: INSERT INTO finalGoal( finalGoalCode, biggestGoalCode, memberCode, managerCode, managerGradeCode, finalGoalName, finalGoalStart, finalGoalEnd, finalGoalDays, finalGoalTimeADay, finalGoalTotalTime, finalGoalTotalBudget, finalGoalNote, finalGoalInputDate ) VALUES ( #{finalGoalCode}, #{biggestGoalCode}, #{memberCode}, #{managerCode}, #{managerGradeCode}, #{finalGoalName}, #{finalGoalStart}, #{finalGoalEnd}, #{finalGoalDays}, #{finalGoalTimeADay}, #{finalGoalTotalTime}, #{finalGoalTotalBudget}, #{finalGoalNote} ,now())
